message: Let's start fair. I take the majority, but you get a small taste of the winnings.
You're not getting off that easy, let's split it roughly in half.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, still giving you a good share.
You're not getting 60%, I'll give you 60% of the value now, but I'll take 60% of the future value too!
Let's try to be reasonable. I'm willing to take 70% now, leaving you with 30%.  We both get a decent share, and we can avoid further inflation risks.
You're pushing it with the 70% offer. I'll give you 55% of the value now, but I'm not giving up more than that.
I'm willing to compromise again. Let's split it 65/35. This gives you a fair share, and we can both walk away with something before things get even worse.
You're getting a bit desperate, I can see that. I'll give you 45% of the value now, but I'm not budging any further.
